summary: While hearing the story of "Gulliver's Travels", a young Russian boy dreams that he is the title character on the island of Lilliput.
cast: Vladimir Konstantinov|Ivan Yudin|Ivan Bobrov|Fyodor Brest|Mikhail Dagmarov|Yuri Khmelnitsky
keywords: 1930s|gulliver|combined animation and live action|soviet animation|live action and animation
director: Director: Aleksandr Ptushko (as A. L. Ptushko)
title: El nuevo Gulliver
